meanings.sent1: The unfertilized egg did not develop into a chick.
meanings.sent2: The farmer found an unfertilized seed in the packet.
meanings.sent3: The unfertilized soil refused to yield any crops.
meanings.sent4: Her unfertilized dreams of success remained unfulfilled.
meanings.sent5: The unfertilized land lay barren under the scorching sun.

meanings.sent1: The unfertilized soil lacked the necessary nutrients for growth.
meanings.sent2: The unfertilized plant withered away in the dry weather.
meanings.sent3: The unfertilized garden looked sad and neglected.
meanings.sent4: Her unfertilized efforts to revive the plant were in vain.
meanings.sent5: The unfertilized fields awaited the arrival of the rainy season.

meanings.sent1: The unfertilized queen bee could not lay eggs.
meanings.sent2: The unfertilized hen did not sit on her eggs.
meanings.sent3: The unfertilized couple decided to adopt a pet instead.
meanings.sent4: His unfertilized ideas failed to inspire any new projects.
meanings.sent5: The unfertilized flowers could not attract any bees for pollination.
